CustomField.description:
All users will have a User Account in Adpoint - but only some will be able to log in to Adpoint (and make Bookings).
This field marks those users. Used in Booking UI for access control Adpoint Bookings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tick if this User has login access to Adpoint. It will also allow this User to make Adpoint Bookings.
CustomField.label: Adpoint Login Access
